diagrams.title: Decision Tree
diagrams.description: Node → Branch A (Prob X) / Branch B (Prob Y) → Outcome → Value

diagrams.title: Binary Search
diagrams.description: Sort List → Pick Middle → Target < Middle? (Left) : Target > Middle? (Right)

diagrams.title: Minimax Algorithm
diagrams.description: Look Ahead → Maximize My Gain → Minimize Opponent Gain → Select

diagrams.title: Fault Tree Analysis
diagrams.description: Undesired Event → Logic Gate (OR/AND) → Lower Events → Root Causes

diagrams.title: Event Tree Analysis
diagrams.description: Initiating Event → System A Works? (Yes/No) → System B Works? (Yes/No) → Consequence

diagrams.title: Genetic Algorithm
diagrams.description: Init Pop → Evaluate Fitness → Select → Crossover/Mutate → New Gen → Loop

diagrams.title: Monte Carlo Sim
diagrams.description: Define Domain → Generate Random Inputs → Loop x10k → Aggregate → Probability

diagrams.title: If-Then-Else
diagrams.description: Condition Met? → True Path ↔ Condition Failed? → False Path

diagrams.title: Switch/Case
diagrams.description: Input Variable → Case 1? → Case 2? → Case 3? → Default

diagrams.title: Recursion
diagrams.description: Function Call → Base Case Met? (Return) : Loop Deeper (Call Self)

diagrams.title: STRIDE
diagrams.description: Inspect Flow → Branch: Spoofing? Tampering? Repudiation? Info Disclosure? DoS?
